info: The second booster pack series released for Gundam M.S War was based on the movie for Gundam Wing titled 'Endless Waltz'. This included all the Gundams in their custom variations as well as the pilots in their movie outfit variations. There was no starter deck for this series. The booster packs had the name 'Gundam M.S. War Gundam-W Endless Waltz' instead of 'Gundam M.S War'. The booster pack also states both factions 'OZ Corp / Wing Gundam Team' on the front.

cards.name: X-18999
cards.battle_scars: Opponent draws 3 cards from Supply Base.

effect.text: Each time you pay 5 or more Prices during the Strategic Phase, you may place one OZ M.S. card without paying its Price during your next Preliminary Phase.

cards.name: L1 Colony
cards.battle_scars: Destroy a Pilot card of your opponent's choice.

effect.text: Return a WG Pilot card of your choice from the Dry Dock to your hand at the beginning of each turn.
Increase all Serpent M.S. cards' Clash Points by 2. They also add Preemptive Strike.

cards.name: The Gundam Scrap Heap
cards.battle_scars: Hold one card and discard the rest of your hand.

effect.text: Return a WG M.S. card of your choice from the Dry Dock to your hand at the beginning of each turn.

cards.name: In the Atmosphere
cards.battle_scars: Destroy a M.S. card of opponent's choice

effect.text: All Atacking or Defending players receive 3 Battle Damages to each Supply Base.

cards.name: In the Satellite's Orbit
cards.battle_scars: Return a M.S. card from the M.S. Dock to the bottom of Supply Base.

effect.text: All Attacking WG M.S. cards add Preemptive Strike.

cards.name: Mariemaia Army Headquarters
cards.battle_scars: Send all Pilot cards in play to the Defunct Pile.

effect.text: Destroy an unattacked Pilot card placed on M.S. Dock when Attacking M.S. cards are not Defended.
Reduce Battle Damages to your Supply Base by 2.

cards.name: Preventer
cards.effect: Move a Pilot card of your choice from the Suppy Base to your hand and reshuffle Supply Base.

cards.name: Neo Titanium
cards.effect: Move this card from your hand to the Dry Dock to pay 3 OZ Prices.

cards.name: The Anniversary of the War's End
cards.effect: All players return entire hand to each Supply Base and reshuffle. Then all redraw 3 cards from the top of each Supply Base.

cards.name: Snatch
cards.effect: Take the effect from opponent's unattached Pilot card on M.S. Dock and apply it to yourself for this turn only.

cards.name: Rally of Mariemaia Army
cards.effect: Return all OZ M.S. cards (even your own) to the M.S. Dock.

cards.name: Colony Infiltration
cards.effect: You may see an opponent's hand.

cards.name: Single Flower
cards.effect: Draw 3 cards from your Supply Base and discard 2 cards of your choice from your hand.

cards.name: Power Transfer
cards.effect: Take the effect from an Attacking M.S. card and apply it to the Defending M.S. card for this turn only.

cards.name: Heat Detector
cards.effect: Restore the ability of a M.S. card of your choice.

cards.name: 13th Constellation
cards.effect: Move a Serpent M.S. card from the Supply Base to your hand and reshuffle Supply Base.

cards.name: Escape From Satellite MO-III
cards.effect: Destroy your Battlefield card return 3 Pilot cards of your choice from the Dry Dock to your hand.

cards.name: Jailbreak
cards.effect: Return as many Pilot cards as you wish from the M.S. Dock to your hand.

cards.name: Gundam Recovery
cards.effect: Place one card on M.S. Dock with paying the Price of a WG M.S. card of your choice from the Dry Dock.

cards.name: Barton Foundation
cards.effect: Destroy one of your M.S. card to draw same number of cards as the Price of the M.S. cards.

cards.name: Descending Operation
cards.effect: Destroy one card in play. You can't Attack or Defend for this turn. This card must be used before Attack Phase.

cards.name: The Real Operation Meteor
cards.effect: Opponent must discard Battle Damage to the Defunct pile for this turn.

cards.name: Blocking
cards.effect: Destroy one of your M.S. card to prevent all M.S. cards (even your own) from Defending.

cards.name: State of Emergency
cards.effect: No players can place any cards during this Strategic Phase.

cards.name: People's Action
cards.effect: All M.S. cards (even your own) can't Attack for this turn.

cards.name: The Pinch
cards.effect: Craw one card from your Supply Base. If that card is a M.S. card, it is placed on M.S. Dock without paying a Price. If not, it is sent to the Dry Dock.

cards.name: Reformed
cards.effect: Void the destruction of a Pilot card.

cards.name: End of Waltz
cards.effect: Destroy all M.S. cards in play (even your own). This card must be used during the Strategic Phase.
